title: The ultra rapid fire is winding down

replies.body: thats what i keep telling them. just leave it in custom
It will just make a lot of people play custom games. Which means more leaver's afk's and a lot more hassle
Yeah, this is a good idea
keep the URF alive! don't kill it, nothing more relaxing than playing a few ranked games then finishing off the day with a 15 min game of key mashing. fun times and great classic hits =)
On Wave 69.69 FM!

Honestly, this time i'm glad it's going... All of you guys are gonna spam this reply with "why wtf is wrong with you" etc etc... But hear me out...
First week was good, fun cause people didn't know who to play, so they tried everything... Until they found the "Meta"Champs of URF... after that week, all I've seen are those Champions (Riven, Ez, Wu, Jax, Eve, Hec, Zed, Sona, Shaco if they aren't banned).. too many champs made it disappointing and to me, quite boring... A constant battle of trying to figure out new champions and seeing who could overcome who but nope, no one.
You'll are gonna complain and say "Why not ban them".. Well think about it. Main champs to ban, Eve, Shaco, Hec, Zed, Sona and whoever the last one would be (most likely a stupid ban). Then people like Riven, Wu, Jax, Nidalee, Ez, Morgana and Leblanc etc slip through EVERY GAME, making it repetitive. Maybe if riot made is 4 or even 5 bans per team, people would actually TRY new things for the WHOLE time URF is out. Oh no can't do that, it's not OP...
So complain away people, I shall take the toxic abuse from whoever may feel the urge to do so haha i really don't care!
Just make the character selection like aram, random.
Random pick URF would be AMAZING !!! RIOT PLEASE TAKE THIS ON BOARD!

I agree with you 100%. I found it frustrating towards the end, because if I, say, wanted to play Malphite for fun and to ult around the place, I couldn't. Because I would get blown up by evelyn or someshit because I dont get 10 bans. I found myself wanting to have 5 or 7 bans so I could remove the flatly broken champs so I wouldn't have to worry about it when I wanted to try a NEW and SLIGHTLY LESS OP pick. I ended up giving in and playing an OP champ so my friends could pick something interesting and we wouldnt get completely smashed.
BTW, hec isnt OP. I destroy him every game "meta urf" picks or not.
malphite IS a meta pick.....

Can I just ask how this is different to normal games?, there are counter picks in urf just as there are in norms. For example TF can wreck an ezreal just as long as they are good at picking the yellow card. In the norm jungle everyone plays the same people (Sejuani, Lee sin, J4) every game because its the META you complain about it getting boring because people found the META champs but the same thing happens in norms once the new patch META champs are found everyone who wants the best chance to win plays those main people. The thing is though people play the champions they find fun regardless and it doesn't mean you're gonna lose instantly. during urf I discovered AD blitzcrank and honestly it was so fun and I ended up out doing a Fed AP blitz. Just cause there are meta champs doesnt mean you cant win. Just like normals it depends on your team comp and how well you make decisions. urf was literally made as a fun joke that ended up being probably the best thing to happen to LoL in a long time. It is relaxing and fun regardless of whether you lose. I think you just need to pull out what ever crawled up your ass and take a chill pill so you can enjoy it for what its for!

Did i every say anything differentiating to normal games? No i did not, and i agree, there are counter picks as i have said in my statements. yes, Normal games also have META Champions, and counters to those, as they have COOLDOWNS and not all the U.R.F buffs. And yes, U.R.F can be fun when playing new things, as you said yourself, AD Blitz, but every enemy team consists of those top 10-15 champions. There is a large difference between both Normal and U.R.F, U.R.F having low cooldowns, etc etc, and normals being more balanced, as no buff can necessarily make a champion strong and snowball in the early game, other than kills. I have those fun games, and i'm not saying that U.R.F is a bad game mode at all, i'm just stating the fact that people in the community are straying away from 'trying new things'and experimenting, i'm not at all blaming anyone or the game mode, just simply implying my thoughts.
I'm glad you raised that as i didn't notify that in my above statement.
Have a good one <3
Ur either forgetting Galio or somehow u don't think he is OP
I didn't list them all, but yes galio was another person who was quite OP During URF
URF fridays or weekends would be fun :)
why even bother... just make it permanent?

no don't make it permanent
if anything should be permanent it should be doom bots

NAH, make poro king permanent, because that was SOOOOOOO fun and i think that it was the VERY BEST GAMEMODE EVER!!!

(sarcasm, incase u didnt figure it out)
As if you didn't like poro King, I thought it was more fun than urf. (Opinion)
Whyy so much hate on URF? he came back for us HE LOVES US!
dont make it permanent. cause then we wont always want to play. most probabaly play because limited time. But URF is fun
That would be so awesome, just like with 3's... so many people would play it! They couldn't have it all the time because i think people would forget to play seriously, but this would be perfect.
But the real question is, when do we get a dominion queue?
This.
Ultra Rapid Fridays

We should make a partition to make it a game mode, i think this is the best thing riot has made, ever!!! It should really be considered and approved to be a game mode. It's a mode where people can look towards to reduce the stresses of other modes. It's fun and enjoyable and no one really argues with anyone as to how poor they play or feed, simply because they enjoy the mode.

I like the idea of having it on Fridays or a set day every week
So it won't get boring.
For me, people argue in URF like 10x more than any other mode
Trying to cause an argument???
Petition
I signed in for this one, its definitely  less stressful then ranked, and after getting rid of draft mode the pvp selection looks kinda empty... Riot please!

Ok, I remember reading this from someone who was talking to complainers of URF disappearing. They said URF is like a chocolate, you have it as a treat every once in a while, and it tastes nice. But if you were to have it every day of your life, you would get sick of it and not eat it. URF is the same, it's fun for a while, but it's really taking away from the core aspect of League of Legends, the MOBA with team-play and strategy. Everyone hates Riot now for removing URF, but think of all the good things Riot does, like refunding the difference of RP if you bought a champion/skin full price and it goes on sale. Riot know how to run their company, so stop complaining about "Wahhhhh(inset tear of the godess spam here) URF is gone, I'll quit League!" Life goes on. If your favourite toy breaks, you still live on with life, something might come along later to replace it too, you never know what Riot might have up it's sleave...
This ^
Please Riot, make URF a gamemode along with ARAM etc.
R.I.P Urf 13/04/2015 7:00PM {{item:3070}} I CRI EVRI TIM
URF is only for people who never really liked LoL in the first place, and only mess around when playing

Good. URF got stale, boring and unfun after the first 3 days. Everyone picked the same boring broken champions every single game and just made the game mode shit, and then trash talk because they picked the most broken champs of URF: {{champion:238}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:55}}. I have not seen any other champions besides these picks, mainly zed, shaco, sona, hecarim and swain and they just make the game mode shit. I say good riddance honestly. Still, at least it attracts all the idiots and trolls so people can have a decent game in normals for once

I've played 90 games thus far across two accounts and only seen Swain twice and Garen once, hardly popular picks and neither seemed anywhere near broken.

Also while Morgana can be extremely strong in the right hands, I've played her in 80 of my games with near 74~% win rate so I know all too well how strong she is, I've only seen 8 other people play her (all on the enemy team, and with me also playing her) and only 1 of them were even remotely good with her (they still lost) while the other 7 were all bad with her going negative KDA and having among the lowest damage in the games. So while she definitely has the potential to be extremely strong, if not broken, in this mode based on my experiences (which includes playing her massively, almost exclusively, in last year's URF as well) very few people are reaching anywhere near that potential.

You obviously have not seen all the noobs who get permastunned in Swain's Nevermove and continously feed the prick. And the problem with URF is that people use whoever is strongest and dominate the game mode with their broken kits. Riot should have more bans for URF or at least nerf the most broken champions in URF for it to actually be effective
i do not use zed bcause hes op i use him bacause i am main him
bring back DOOM BOTS (instead of URF)
make urf forever {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
bring back urf
